entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
